summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account over the month of April 2015. It outlines various debits and credits, including preauthorized debits for payroll and taxes, as well as a significant transfer of funds. The document is marked as confidential and includes instructions for addressing errors in transactions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account balance.

events.title: Account Balance Summary
events.description: The document summarizes the account balance and transactions for the month of April 2015.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $200,000.00 was made into the account.

locations: 575 Lexington Ave, 4th FL, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $219,677.39 as of April 1, 2015.
A significant transfer of $200,000.00 occurred on April 16, 2015.
Multiple preauthorized debits for payroll and taxes were recorded throughout the month.
The document is marked as confidential and contains instructions for addressing transaction errors.
